long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of the time-consuming process of scheduling your classes? Our student-built extension is here to help!

Our extension is designed to work in conjunction with the existing SIS system, providing users with a range of features to enhance the scheduling experience. 

With MSU Class Helper you can:
    * Instantly view information on teachers' courses
    * Add multiple classes to a virtual schedule
    * Visualize possible conflicts in the virtual schedule
    * Create many schedule options
    * Plan schedules for future semesters without interference
    * Automatically generate schedules using advanced algorithms

Our goal is to provide students with an enhanced scheduling experience that makes the process easier, more efficient, and more enjoyable. The extension code is open source and can be downloaded to prove that no personal identifying information is being collected in communication with the server.

If you're ready to take control of your class schedule without the headaches, download our extension today and experience a more streamlined scheduling process.
